translation.en: The rumors of my promiscuity have been greatly exaggerated.
translation.zh:
关于我混乱的谣言
其实有点言过其实

translation.en: I used to be anonymous, invisible to the opposite sex.
translation.zh:
我曾经是所谓的无名氏
异性的眼中没有我

translation.en: If Google Earth were a guy...
translation.zh: 如果谷歌地球是男性

translation.en: ...he couldn't find me if I was dressed up as a 10-story building.
translation.zh:
他也绝对找不到我
就算是我打扮成十层楼高的建筑

translation.en: Pretty cutting-edge stuff, huh? A high school girl feeling anonymous.
translation.zh:
讲得很严重，对吧？
一个高中女生觉得是无名氏

translation.en: Who am I? What does it all mean? Why am I here? Blah.
translation.zh:
我是谁？这代表什么？
为什么我在这里？

translation.en: But don't worry, this isn't one of those tales.
translation.zh: 不要担心，这不是一般的童话故事

translation.en: Though it sure started out that way.
translation.zh: 虽然是很通俗的开场

translation.en: And then it changed pretty quickly when I started lying...
translation.zh:
但是故事进行地很不一样
当我开始撒谎以后...

translation.en: ...about some very personal things.
translation.zh: 对于那些很私人的事情

translation.en: So let the record show that I, Olive Penderghast...
translation.zh: 就让我奥莉薇潘德盖斯

translation.en: ...being of sound mind, and below-average breast size...
translation.zh:
在纪录中说明自己
有着小于普通尺寸的胸部

translation.en: ...swear to tell the truth, the whole truth...
translation.zh: 发誓所有事情都是真的

translation.en: ...and nothing but the truth. Starting now.
translation.zh:
所有的事情都不是谎言
现在开始吧

translation.en: And what better way to share my private thoughts...
translation.zh: 有哪种方法来分享我的私人思绪

translation.en: ...than to broadcast them on the Internet?
translation.zh:
比在网络上大声讨论
来得更好的呢？

translation.en: So here it is. Part one.
translation.zh: 所以，第一部开始

translation.en: The shudder-inducing and clichéd, however totally false account...
translation.zh:
令人忍受不了的陈腔滥调
但却是搞错了...

translation.en: ...of how I lost my virginity to a guy at a community college.
translation.zh:
关于我将第一次
献给一个在大学的男生

translation.en: Let me just begin by saying that there are two sides to every story.
translation.zh:
让我首先说
故事一定都有双方的说法

translation.en: And this is my side, the right one.
translation.zh: 这是我的部份，当然是正确的一方

translation.en: George is not a sexy name.
translation.zh: 乔治不是个性感的名字

translation.en: George is what you name your teddy bear...
translation.zh: 乔治是你帮你的泰迪熊命名的那种

translation.en: ...not the name you wanna scream out during climax.
translation.zh:
不是那种在高潮的时候
会尖叫的名字

translation.en: And by that, I assume you mean...?
translation.zh: 所以...你的意思是...？

translation.en: The stable and self-perpetuating end stage...
translation.zh: 稳定，自身不朽的最终舞台

translation.en: ...in the evolution of a plant community.
translation.zh: 在植物界的演化中

translation.en: -Right. -Why, what were you thinking?
translation.zh:
-嗯
-怎么了？你在想什么？

translation.en: The same. But I don't say it out loud lest someone get the wrong idea.
translation.zh:
一样的东西
但是我不会讲出来以免错误联想

translation.en: I think you know innuendo is attached to everything these days.
translation.zh:
我想你知道现在所有东西
都和讽刺牵扯得上

translation.en: Innuendo? What--? Whatever do you mean?
translation.zh:
讽刺？什么...？
不管你想要说什么...

translation.en: Rhiannon, Olive, go hit the books. They don't hit back.
translation.zh:
瑞雅娜，奥莉薇记得去念书
它们不会自己念

translation.en: Also, hugs not drugs. Mess with the bull, get the horns.
translation.zh:
还有，拥抱拒绝毒品
惹恼公牛，被角戳

translation.en: And any other clichés you can come up with.
translation.zh: 还有其他陈腔滥调你可以联想

translation.en: Bye, Mr. Griffith.
translation.zh: 再见，葛利芬斯先生

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -Watch your mouth. -Sorry.
translation.zh:
-注意你的言行
-抱歉

translation.en: Mr. Griffith is my favorite teacher.
translation.zh: 葛利芬斯先生是我最喜欢的老师

translation.en: Although, after all the trouble I caused...
translation.zh: 但是在我闯出这么多祸之后

translation.en: ...I don't know if I'm still his favorite student.
translation.zh:
我不知道我还是不是
他最喜欢的学生

translation.en: You know, these are bad for you.
translation.zh: 这些对你不好

translation.en: It leads to unwanted pregnancy, all sorts of things.
translation.zh: 会有无法的怀孕之类的事情

translation.en: Mismatched tires on your vehicle, which is nonexistent.
translation.zh:
不同的车子配不同轮胎
是不可能发生的

translation.en: And here is where the trouble began. The lie that started the whole thing.
translation.zh:
这就是麻烦的开始
一个谎言引发整件事情

translation.en: Please, please, I'm begging you. I will pay you. I'll pay you.
translation.zh:
拜托，我求求你
我会付你钱的，绝对会

translation.en: Rhi, I cannot go camping with you, okay?
translation.zh:
瑞，我不能和你一起去露营
好吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I have a date.
translation.zh: 抱歉，但是我有约会了

translation.en: -Okay? I told you. -With who?
translation.zh:
-好吗？我和你说过了
-和谁？

translation.en: -You don't know him. -And neither do you, you selfish bitch.
translation.zh:
-你不认识他
-你也不认识，你这个自私鬼

translation.en: Yes, I do. He goes to college with my brother.
translation.zh:
我当然认识
他和我哥哥上同一间大学

translation.en: Okay. What's his name, then?
translation.zh: 好吧，那他叫做什么名字？

translation.en: Rhiannon is what you'd call a strong personality.
translation.zh:
瑞雅娜就是你知道的那种
死缠烂打的人

translation.en: She asked me to come camping with her family...
translation.zh:
几星期前
她要求我和她家人一起去露营

translation.en: ...and I don't know why I didn't wanna go.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么我不想去

translation.en: A little because I didn't feel like hanging out with her all weekend.
translation.zh:
可能是因为
我不想要整个周末都和她在一起

translation.en: But mostly because her parents are the weirdest people I have ever met...
translation.zh:
但是多数是因为她父母
是我见过最奇怪的人

translation.en: ...and I live in California.
translation.zh: 而我是住在加州喔

translation.en: I ate dinner at her house once and I swore, never again.
translation.zh:
我在她家吃过一次晚餐
我发誓绝对不再去第二次

translation.en: -This is interesting. -Patchouli burger.
translation.zh:
-这看起来很有趣
-广藿香汉堡

translation.en: We grew it in our victory garden.
translation.zh: 我们在自家的胜利花园种的

translation.en: You want some dessert?
translation.zh: 你想要吃甜点吗？

translation.en: No, thank you. I'm trying to watch my figure.
translation.zh: 不用，谢谢你，我要保持身材

translation.en: Well, I'm not.
translation.zh: 我不用

translation.en: So I lied and told her I couldn't go...
translation.zh: 所以我说谎告诉她我不能去

translation.en: ...because I had a date with a friend of my brother's named George.
translation.zh:
因为我要和我哥哥的朋友
乔治去约会

translation.en: Let's just face it, there is no such thing as a sexy George.
translation.zh:
让我们面对现实
没有叫作乔治的人会很性感

translation.en: Yeah, well, mine is...
translation.zh: 嗯，我的是...

translation.en: ...so I think we should just put this conversation to bed.
translation.zh:
所以我想我们应该
不要再讨论这个了

translation.en: Fine, don't go camping with us. Just know I hate you, bitch.
translation.zh:
好吧，不要和我们去露营
我恨你，讨厌鬼

translation.en: Go get your chocolate milk.
translation.zh: 去拿你的巧克力牛奶

translation.en: -Do you want one? -No.
translation.zh:
-你也要吗？
-不用

translation.en: And here's how I really spent the weekend.
translation.zh: 这就是我度过周末的地方

translation.en: That's the worst song ever.
translation.zh: 这是最难听的歌了

translation.en: But on Monday, when Rhi asked me how my weekend was....
translation.zh:
但是当星期一
瑞问我周末过得如何

translation.en: He was charming, you know? He was a real gentleman.
translation.zh: 他很迷人，非常地绅士

translation.en: And it feels like I got a love and I know that it's all mine.
translation.zh:
就像是我找到真爱
我知道这感觉都属于我的

translation.en: Okay, okay. Wait, wait. So are you going to see him again?
translation.zh:
好，等等
所以你要再和他约会一次？

translation.en: No. No, probably not. You know, it was just one of those weekends.
translation.zh:
不，也许不会了
这只是周末的消遣而已

translation.en: A whole weekend?
translation.zh: 整个周末？

translation.en: Yup.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: -Wait a minute. You didn't have--? -What?
translation.zh:
-等一下
-什么？ 你们不会...？

translation.en: No. No, of course not.
translation.zh: 不，不，当然没有

translation.en: You liar. You totally lost your V-card to him.
translation.zh:
你这个骗子
你绝对把你的第一次给他了

translation.en: -No, I didn't. -Yes, you did.
translation.zh:
-不，我没有
-你就是有

translation.en: -Tell me everything. -Rhi, I'm not that kind of girl.
translation.zh:
-告诉我发生的事
-瑞，我不是那种女孩

translation.en: The kind that does it, or the kind that does it...
translation.zh: 是那种不会去做，或是那种做了...

translation.en: ...and doesn't have the balls to tell her friend?
translation.zh: 但是却没有勇气告诉她朋友的人？

translation.en: -What? -I want every detail.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-我要听所有的细节

translation.en: -Rhi. -Now, bitch.
translation.zh:
-瑞
-快点，讨厌鬼

translation.en: You know, you call me "bitch" a lot. Okay?
translation.zh: 你自己知道你常叫我讨厌鬼吗？

translation.en: -It's not a term of endearment. -I want every detail. Now, shitface.
translation.zh:
-这不是什么亲切的叫法
-我要听所有的细节，屎脸

translation.en: You're not heading in the right direction.
translation.zh: 你全部都搞错了

translation.en: Tell me.
translation.zh: 那你说啊

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: We did it.
translation.zh: 我们做了

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 我就说嘛

translation.en: Finally. Now you're a super slut like me.
translation.zh: 所以你也终于像我一样淫荡了

translation.en: I don't think letting Peter Hedlund motorboat you...
translation.zh: 我不认为你和彼得海德恩

translation.en: ...behind a Bed Bath & Beyond really makes you a super slut.
translation.zh:
在家用品商店做之后
就让你成为了淫荡的人

translation.en: There were a lot of people walking past. Someone could've easily seen.
translation.zh:
那里有很多人经过啊
很有可能被其他人看到

translation.en: Whatever. This isn't about me, this is about you.
translation.zh:
无论如何，不是在讲我
是关于你的事情

translation.en: What'd you let him do?
translation.zh: 你会让他做什么？

translation.en: It was normal. You know? Nothing freaky.
translation.zh:
很正常的那种，你知道的
没有什么怪异的

translation.en: I don't know why I did it.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么这样说

translation.en: I guess maybe it was because it was the first time...
translation.zh: 我想也许这是第一次

translation.en: ...I had sort of felt superior to Rhi.
translation.zh: 我终于比过瑞的感觉了

translation.en: But I just started piling on lie after lie. It was like setting up Jenga.
translation.zh:
我开始用谎言盖过谎言
像是建造叠叠乐一样

translation.en: Do you know, like, Glade candles?
translation.zh: 像是有那种葛雷德卖的蜡烛？

translation.en: Those kind, but they were, like, sexy Glade candles.
translation.zh: 是那种非常性感的葛雷德蜡烛

translation.en: -He was sweet. He was.... -Of course.
translation.zh:
-他很甜蜜
-这是当然的

translation.en: What the hell are you looking at, Sister Christian?
translation.zh: 你在看哪里？克莉丝汀姐妹？

translation.en: Just a couple of admitted whores.
translation.zh: 只是一对公认的妓女

translation.en: Marianne Bryant is the secretary of the student council...
translation.zh: 玛莉安布莱特是学生会的秘书

translation.en: ...chairman of the Orange Blossom dance committee...
translation.zh: 橘子熟了舞蹈委员会的执行长

translation.en: ...and president of the Cross Your Heart Club...
translation.zh: 以及在胸前祷告俱乐部的会长

translation.en: ...a club dedicated to shoving their beliefs down people's throats.
translation.zh:
那是一个俱乐部
强迫别人要接受他们的思想

translation.en: Obviously they don't care.
translation.zh: 很明显他们根本不在乎

translation.en: Last year's cause célèbre was the changing of the school mascot.
translation.zh:
去年著名的事件
就是更改了本校的吉祥物

translation.en: Give it up for your Blue Devils!
translation.zh: 释放你们的蓝魔鬼

translation.en: Blue!
translation.zh: 蓝色的

translation.en: Blue Devil!
translation.zh: 蓝魔鬼

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: How can we exhibit school pride when we're conveyed to others...
translation.zh:
我们如何呈现学校的骄傲
当我们告诉其他人...

translation.en: ...as Satan worshippers?
translation.zh: 我们自己崇拜着撒旦？

translation.en: Now, thankfully, we're the much less intimidating....
translation.zh:
现在很感谢的是...
我们受到比较少的胁迫了

translation.en: Give it up for the Woodchucks!
translation.zh: 土拨鼠上场了

translation.en: Hey! Go, Woodchucks!
translation.zh: 嗨，土拨鼠加油

translation.en: Woodchucks!
translation.zh: 土拨鼠

translation.en: I liked Todd much better when he was topless.
translation.zh: 我比较喜欢陶德脱掉上衣时

translation.en: Yeah, but even dressed as a woodchuck, I still fantasize about him.
translation.zh:
即使是穿得像个土拨鼠
我还是很欣赏他

translation.en: Woodchucks.
translation.zh: 土拨鼠

translation.en: Now Marianne had a new cause célèbre.
translation.zh: 现在玛莉安有了个新目标

translation.en: Me.
translation.zh: 就是我

translation.en: Which brings us to part two.
translation.zh: 所以就要进到故事的第二部

translation.en: The accelerated velocity of terminological inexactitude.
translation.zh: 不正确词汇的加速过程

translation.en: Which is really just my obnoxious way of saying that lies travel fast.
translation.zh:
这只是我痛恨
谎言传递这么快的说法

translation.en: And, boy, did my terminological inexactitude accelerate with velocity.
translation.zh:
我的不正确词汇
真的在加速度前进

translation.en: Did you hear about Olive?
translation.zh: 你有听过奥莉薇的事吗？

translation.en: No way.
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: -She's not a virgin anymore? -I can't believe it.
translation.zh:
-她不是处女了
-我不敢相信

translation.en: -Olive lost her virginity. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-奥莉薇不是处女了
-对啊

translation.en: Maybe next time a certain somebody will be a little more careful...
translation.zh: 也许下一次某人要多加小心点

translation.en: ...what she says in the water closet.
translation.zh: 当她在厕所聊天的时候

translation.en: Yeah, about that? It's-- That's actually not what you think.
translation.zh: 关于那件事...并不是你想的那样

translation.en: Can I talk to you alone for a second?
translation.zh: 我可以私下和你谈谈吗？

translation.en: -You gonna be okay? -Yeah, I'm fine. Thank you.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-嗯，我很好，谢谢

translation.en: Bye, Nina.
translation.zh: 再见，妮娜

translation.en: What you heard in the bathroom the other day wasn't true at all.
translation.zh: 你在厕所听的那些都不是真的

translation.en: -It's actually a funny story. -Olive. That's your name, right?
translation.zh:
-只是个有趣的故事
-奥莉薇是你的名字，对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. And you're Marianne.
translation.zh: 对，而你是玛莉安

translation.en: We've had nine classes together since kindergarten.
translation.zh:
从我们幼稚园开始
我们一起上了九堂课

translation.en: Ten, if you count Religion of Other Cultures, which you didn't...
translation.zh:
十堂课，如果你还算上
其他文化的宗教课，而你没有...

translation.en: ...because you refused to go.
translation.zh: 因为你不去上课

translation.en: Yeah. Listen, I'm not the one that you have to answer to...
translation.zh: 听着，你要寻求解脱的人不是我

translation.en: ...for your depraved behavior.
translation.zh: 对于你那堕落的行径

translation.en: There's a higher power that will judge you for your indecency.
translation.zh:
有更高的权力象征
会对于你的堕落给予审判

translation.en: Tom Cruise?
translation.zh: 汤姆克鲁斯吗？

translation.en: I hope for your sake that God has a sense of humor.
translation.zh: 我希望神会对你的幽默感到有趣

translation.en: Oh, I have 17 years' worth of anecdotal proof he does.
translation.zh: 我有17年的趣事来代表他绝对有

translation.en: You've made your bed.
translation.zh: 你已经闯祸了

translation.en: I just hope for your sake that you've cleaned the sheets.
translation.zh: 我只是希望你也有清理后续

translation.en: -Did I just get saved? -I missed you.
translation.zh:
-我被拯救了吗？
-我好想你

translation.en: Oh, you too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: So Marianne spread the rumor.
translation.zh: 所以是玛莉安把谣言传出去

translation.en: For the first time ever, my sexual exploits were the talk of the school.
translation.zh: 第一次，我的性爱功勋在校园流传

translation.en: Oh, you know what? I'm wrong. It was the second time.
translation.zh:
你知道吗？我错了
这其实是第二次

translation.en: The first time was back in 8th grade...
translation.zh: 第一次是在8年级的时候

translation.en: ...when all I wanted was a kiss from this guy I had always had a crush on.
translation.zh:
我只是想要
我喜欢的那个男孩亲我一下

translation.en: Todd and I were thrown together in Seven Minutes of Heaven.
translation.zh:
陶德和我一起被丢到
〝只有七分钟的天堂〞

translation.en: Luckily we had a super romantic song from our youth to set the mood.
translation.zh:
幸运地
我们的年轻可以谱出个浪漫的歌曲

translation.en: I think this is the part...
translation.zh: 我想这个部份...

translation.en: ...where you're supposed to stick your tongue in my mouth.
translation.zh: 就是你把你的舌头伸进我的嘴巴里

translation.en: That's what I've heard, anyway.
translation.zh: 总之这是我听来的

translation.en: Just give me a second, okay?
translation.zh: 给我一秒钟想想，好吗？

translation.en: According to my watch, you have 382 of them.
translation.zh:
根据我的表显示
你有三百八十二秒

translation.en: -How do you do that? -What?
translation.zh:
-你怎么做的？
-什么？

translation.en: Add so fast. And you also talk like a grown-up.
translation.zh:
计算这么地快
你讲话的态度也像个大人

translation.en: Don't worry, I'm not nearly as smart as I think I am.
translation.zh:
别担心
我并不像我自己想得一样聪明

translation.en: So if we didn't do anything, could you still tell people we kissed?
translation.zh:
所以如果我们没有做任何事情
你可以告诉他人说我们亲过了吗？

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: 当然喽

translation.en: -Thanks, Olive. -Sure, Todd.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你，奥莉薇
-不客气，陶德

translation.en: I actually didn't wanna lie that time.
translation.zh: 上次我其实不想撒谎

translation.en: When people thought I'd kissed someone, they didn't care.
translation.zh:
当其他人认为我亲了某人
他们其实并不在乎

translation.en: But when they thought I slept with someone....
translation.zh: 但当他们认为我和谁睡在一起...

translation.en: Hey, Olive. How's it going?
translation.zh: 嗨，奥莉薇，你今天好吗？

translation.en: I'm swell, Guy-I've-Never-Talked-to-Before.
translation.zh:
我真伟大啊
从来不会和我说话的男生

translation.en: Thanks for asking.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的问候

translation.en: All I could think to myself was, "Great, now I'm a tramp."
translation.zh:
我当时只会这样想
〝真不错，现在我是荡妇了〞

translation.en: I'm gonna have to get a lower-back tattoo...
translation.zh: 我必须要在后背刺个刺青

translation.en: ...and pierce something not on my face.
translation.zh: 然后穿个环，并不是在脸上

translation.en: You guys know that I was here all weekend, right?
translation.zh:
你们知道我这周末都在这里
对吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yes, you were upstairs.
translation.zh:
-对啊
-没错，你在楼下

translation.en: -Yeah. -You would testify to that?
translation.zh:
-对
-你会为我作证吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -I would take a bullet for you.
translation.zh:
-会
-我会为你挡子弹

translation.en: You know that. Right between the eyes.
translation.zh: 你知道的，就挡在两眼之间

translation.en: Man, I would slit my throat...
translation.zh: 我会撕裂我的喉咙

translation.en: ...rather than say something to someone...
translation.zh: 也不会对其他人说...

translation.en: -...that you didn't want me to say. -That's not necessary.
translation.zh:
-你不想要我说的话
-这倒不必要了

translation.en: -But that is comforting. -That's how I am, how I roll.
translation.zh:
-但是听了还满安慰的
-这就是我做人的方式

translation.en: That's how I do, as they say.
translation.zh: 这就是我做的方式，大家都知道的

translation.en: -I like the pants. -Thank you. They're Costco.
translation.zh:
-我喜欢你的裤子
-谢谢你，是在好市多买的

translation.en: You can have them when you get taller.
translation.zh: 你再长高点就可以去买了

translation.en: -I'm never gonna go through puberty. -Course you will.
translation.zh:
-我永远不会度过青春期的
-你当然会啊

translation.en: But we're a family of late bloomers.
translation.zh: 但是我们家的人都很晚熟

translation.en: I didn't until I was 14. Nor did Olive.
translation.zh: 我到14岁才成熟，奥莉薇也是

translation.en: Why does that matter? I'm adopted.
translation.zh: 这有什么重要的？我是被领养的

translation.en: What? Oh, my God. Who told you?
translation.zh: 什么？天啊！谁告诉你的？

translation.en: Guys, we were gonna do this at the right time.
translation.zh:
大伙
我们必须要找对的时刻再谈这个

translation.en: Listen to me.
translation.zh: 听我说

translation.en: Sometimes, even when a man and a woman love each other very much...
translation.zh: 有时候即使两人非常相爱

translation.en: ...like your mother and I used to...
translation.zh: 像是你的妈妈和我以前一样

translation.en: ...their insides just don't cooperate with each other.
translation.zh: 他们的内心却没有办法在一起

translation.en: So, what's going on, honey?
translation.zh: 所以结果呢？甜心

translation.en: Why do you want us to take a bullet if anyone asks if you were here?
translation.zh:
为什么你要我们替你抵挡子弹？
如果有人问你是不是在这里

translation.en: It's nothing. It's just the rumor mill.
translation.zh: 没什么，只是一个谣言而已

translation.en: What's the rumor mill churning out these days? Anything interesting?
translation.zh:
现在有什么样的谣言在传啊？
有趣的吗？

translation.en: You know, not really. Not really. It's a little low on grist.
translation.zh:
没有什么，一点都不有趣
只是普通的那种

translation.en: Clever wordplay. I like it. You must be related to me.
translation.zh:
玩文字游戏？我喜欢
你一定是我的小孩

translation.en: -Only by marriage. -Give it to me.
translation.zh:
-只是婚姻的结合
-把那个给我

translation.en: So, what we're all gonna take away from this:
translation.zh: 所以我们的话题有点偏离了

translation.en: -I was here all weekend, right? -Yes, yes, yes.
translation.zh:
-我一整个周末都在这里
-对，对，没错

translation.en: Remember how I told you Google Earth couldn't find me...
translation.zh:
记得我告诉过你
谷歌地球也找不到我

translation.en: ...if I was dressed up as a ten-story building?
translation.zh: 就算是我装扮成十层楼高的建筑？

translation.en: Well, the next day it could find me if I was dressed as a crack on a sidewalk.
translation.zh:
隔天就算我是人行道上的砖块
它都可以直接辨识到我了

translation.en: That's the beauty of being a girl in high school.
translation.zh: 这就是在高中身为女孩的优势

translation.en: People hear you had sex once and, bam, you're a bimbo.
translation.zh:
大家一听说你做过爱了
忽然间你就成为了女人

translation.en: I really didn't mean for the lie to put me on the map...
translation.zh:
我并不是故意说谎
让我变成有名的人

translation.en: ...but I gotta admit, I kind of liked being on the map.
translation.zh: 但是我要承认，当名人的感觉真好

translation.en: So, clearly Nathaniel Hawthorne is a complex writer.
translation.zh:
明显的
纳撒尼尔霍桑是个复杂的作家

translation.en: Even I had trouble with him.
translation.zh: 即便是我也读不太懂他的作品

translation.en: I read him originally when I was 5, but I struggled.
translation.zh:
我在5岁的时候就读了
但是我还是读不懂

translation.en: So I'm gonna break it down for you. I'm gonna throw some rhymes.
translation.zh:
所以我把结构分段来
我会把韵文挑出来

translation.en: Anson, drop me a beat.
translation.zh: 安森，给我一点节奏

translation.en: -What? -Give me a beat.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-来点节拍吧

translation.en: Push it up.
translation.zh: 就这样吧

translation.en: Yeah, adultery, vengeance Crimes of passion
translation.zh: 外遇，报仇，激情的犯罪

translation.en: Kill the beat. I'm not gonna rap for you.
translation.zh: 停止节拍，我才不要为你唱饶舌

translation.en: It's pandering and it's been done before...
translation.zh: 这是在拖剧情，以前都已经做过了

translation.en: ...in every bad movie you've ever seen. Okay.
translation.zh: 在你看过的每部烂电影中

translation.en: Ironically, we were studying The Scarlet Letter.
translation.zh:
讽刺的是我们正在念
《The Scarlet Letter》

translation.en: Now, isn't that always the way?
translation.zh: 所以并不总是一样的吗？

translation.en: The books you read in class always have some strong connection...
translation.zh:
你在课堂上读到的
总是和现实有所连贯

translation.en: ...with whatever angsty adolescent drama is going on.
translation.zh: 和所谓的青少年剧情连贯

translation.en: Except for Huckleberry Finn. I don't know any teenage boys...
translation.zh: 除了哈克芬，我不认识其他青少年

translation.en: ...who have ever run away with a big, hulking black guy.
translation.zh: 可以从巨大的黑人那里逃出来

translation.en: For those who haven't read The Scarlet Letter...
translation.zh:
对于没有读过
《The Scarlet letter》的人

translation.en: ...or for those who said you did but didn't, here's all you need to know.
translation.zh:
或是你说你有读过但是其实没有
这就是你所需要知道的

translation.en: This girl, Hester Prynne, has an affair with a minister...
translation.zh:
有个女孩，赫丝特普林
和一个神父有个外遇

translation.en: ...is besmirched and made to wear a red A for "adulterer."
translation.zh:
是种污秽的罪
所以必须穿着红色A代表外遇者

translation.en: The town realizes she was too harshly judged...
translation.zh: 城镇后来知道审判过于仓促

translation.en: ...and she's really a good person, and she dies a saint.
translation.zh:
她其实是个好人
所以死后成为圣人

translation.en: A whole bunch of other stuff happens too.
translation.zh: 还有其他的事情也有发生

translation.en: If you have a test on it, rent the movie, but make sure it's the original...
translation.zh:
如果你想知道更多
就去租片子来看，记得要看原版的

translation.en: ...not the Demi Moore version where she talks in a fake British accent...
translation.zh:
而不是黛米摩尔的版本
她装成英国腔调的那个

translation.en: ...and takes a lot of baths.
translation.zh: 然后还拼命洗澡的那版本

translation.en: To say that one was freely adapted is a bit of an understatement, guvnor.
translation.zh:
要说是完全地一样
其实有点轻描淡写，庭上

translation.en: What we have to realize...
translation.zh: 我们必须要了解

translation.en: ...is that Hester lived in an entirely different time.
translation.zh: 赫丝特活在不同的时代

translation.en: A time when the worst crime a woman could commit was in fact adultery.
translation.zh: 在当时女人犯罪严重的罪就是外遇

translation.en: Nina.
translation.zh: 妮娜

translation.en: I think Hester Prynne was-- Excuse my language. --a skank.
translation.zh:
我想赫丝特普林是个...
请原谅我的用语，低贱的人

translation.en: A skank? So you don't think she was a victim at all?
translation.zh:
低贱的人？
所以你不觉得她是个受害者？

translation.en: Why should I? She brought it on herself.
translation.zh: 为什么？是她自己的错啊

translation.en: Perhaps you should embroider a red A on your wardrobe, abominable tramp.
translation.zh:
也许应该要刺一个A在你的衣橱上
你这个恶心的荡妇

translation.en: Perhaps you should get a wardrobe, you abominable twat.
translation.zh:
也许你要先去买个衣橱吧
可憎的贱人

translation.en: Not my best line, but it was provocative enough...
translation.zh:
不是我说过最好听的话
但是这真的已经足够...

translation.en: ...to land me in the principal's office.
translation.zh: 把我送到校长室里了

translation.en: Seems as if someone's on a downward spiral.
translation.zh: 看起来有人不是很守规矩

translation.en: Seems as if someone's practicing the mundane activities...
translation.zh: 看起来有人在练习俗世的行为

translation.en: ...she'll be saddled with the rest of her life.
translation.zh: 但是在她一生都会被其他人纠缠

translation.en: I hope you at least had the good sense to use protection.
translation.zh: 我希望你至少要懂得防护措施

translation.en: Why? Your parents didn't.
translation.zh: 为什么？你的父母就没有

translation.en: -You're going to hell. -Just as long as you won't be there.
translation.zh:
-你会下地狱
-只要你不在那边就好

translation.en: I can assure you I won't.
translation.zh: 我保证我绝对不会

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 那很好

translation.en: I don't care who started it. Just work it out.
translation.zh:
我不管是谁开始吵的
你们把这事情给我解决

translation.en: Penderghast.
translation.zh: 潘德盖斯

translation.en: So why am I just meeting you?
translation.zh: 为什么你会来到我的办公室？

translation.en: Language like this would've warranted a visit years ago.
translation.zh:
这样的言论
在之前绝对是要请父母来校的

translation.en: This is the first time I've done anything remotely misbehavioral.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次行为偏颇

translation.en: This is foul.
translation.zh: 这是不对的

translation.en: I know. I am so-- I'm really, really sorry.
translation.zh: 我知道，我真的非常地抱歉

translation.en: Sorry you said it or sorry you got caught?
translation.zh:
抱歉你不该说的
还是抱歉因为你被抓到这样说

translation.en: Sorry I said it, honestly.
translation.zh: 抱歉我说这样的话，真的

translation.en: And sorry I got caught a little bit too, but mostly just sorry I said it.
translation.zh:
也有点懊悔被抓到
但是多数是因为我说了这样的话

translation.en: If you use a word like this again in my school, it'll be your last. Understand?
translation.zh:
如果你在我的学校用这样的语言
就绝对会是最后一次了，知道吗？

translation.en: Yes, sir. Yes.
translation.zh: 是的，先生，我懂

translation.en: I mean, this isn't one of those progressive schools...
translation.zh: 这不是那种很进步的学校

translation.en: ...where teachers are called by their first names...
translation.zh: 可以用名字称呼老师

translation.en: ...and students are partners in learning...
translation.zh: 然后学生成群学习

translation.en: ...and there's a fundraising auction at the end of the year...
translation.zh: 年末有家长捐钱的那种

translation.en: ...where the more creative parents put on musical skits...
translation.zh:
在那里有很多
创作型的父母会编音乐短剧

translation.en: ...about the community garden.
translation.zh: 关于社区的花园之类的

translation.en: This is public school.
translation.zh: 这里是公立学校

translation.en: If I can keep the girls off the pole and the boys off the pipe, I get a bonus.
translation.zh:
如果我可以把男生女生都管得好
我就可以拿到额外的奖金

translation.en: Now, if you're sent to me one more time...
translation.zh: 如果我在办公室再见到你

translation.en: ...you're gonna be out on your fantail. Now, am I making myself clear?
translation.zh:
你就要留校察看了
这样讲清楚了吗？

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是的，先生

translation.en: -Good. -I think so.
translation.zh:
-很好
-我想是的

translation.en: I mean, I got a little lost in the middle, but I found my way back.
translation.zh:
我在中间有点神游
但是我还是听懂了

translation.en: Detention after school tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天放学后留校察看

translation.en: Now, out.
translation.zh: 就这样，出去吧

translation.en: Even though it was my slutty alter ego that said a bad word in school...
translation.zh:
虽然是我那淫荡的骄傲在学校
说出那样的话

translation.en: ...it was my ass that got in trouble...
translation.zh: 却让我遭遇到了麻烦

translation.en: ...which was a place my ass had never been before.
translation.zh: 是我从来都没有的大麻烦

translation.en: Hey, Olive.
translation.zh: 嗨，奥莉薇

translation.en: Oh, my God. The illusion is shattered.
translation.zh: 天啊，梦想破碎

translation.en: They put you in the gas chamber if you take your head off at Disney World.
translation.zh:
如果你在迪士尼世界把面具拿下
他们会把你放在毒气室里

translation.en: I think they just fire you. You're thinking of Disneyland.
translation.zh:
我想他们只会炒你鱿鱼
你想的是迪士尼乐园

translation.en: -Disney World is more liberal. -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh:
-迪士尼世界还比较自由
-也是

translation.en: I always forget Disney World went blue in the last election.
translation.zh:
我都忘记上次选举中
迪士尼世界赞助民主党了

translation.en: Are you going to Melody Bostic's party?
translation.zh: 你会去美乐蒂波斯提克的派对吗？

translation.en: I hadn't planned on it.
translation.zh: 没有想过要去

translation.en: Me neither. My cousin's getting married. It's a rehearsal dinner.
translation.zh:
我也是，我的表哥要结婚了
那是个排练的晚餐

translation.en: See you. Stay excellent.
translation.zh: 再见，表现好一点啊

translation.en: You too.
translation.zh: 你也是

translation.en: -What's up, kid? -Woodchuck.
translation.zh:
-怎么了？孩子
-土拨鼠好啊

translation.en: Please tell me the rumors are true.
translation.zh: 请告诉我那谣言是真的

translation.en: Yes. Yes. I am a big, fat slut.
translation.zh: 对，我就是个淫荡胖女人

translation.en: No, the one where you got suspended for calling Nina Howell a dick...
translation.zh:
不是，是你因为骂妮娜霍尔
而被留校察看了

translation.en: ...and punching her in the left tit.
translation.zh: 还有用左边的胸部撞她

translation.en: I worry about the way information circulates at this school.
translation.zh: 我有点担心这学校传谣言的方式了

translation.en: Rhi? I need to tell you something.
translation.zh: 瑞？我要告诉你一件事

translation.en: Like the exact moment you turned into such a badass?
translation.zh: 像是你何时成为那么酷的吗？

translation.en: -I think I'm in love with you. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-我想我爱上你了
-好吧

translation.en: Tell me you left a mark on that scrunched-up face of hers?
translation.zh: 告诉我你至少在她的脸上留下伤痕了？

translation.en: -It's not true. -It wasn't the left tit?
translation.zh:
-这不是真的
-不是用左胸？

translation.en: It was the right one. I always pegged you for a southpaw.
translation.zh:
是右胸
我一直都以为你用左手哩

translation.en: Can you listen to me for one second, please?
translation.zh: 你可以静下来听我说话吗？

translation.en: Okay. It didn't happen.
translation.zh: 这完全没有发生

translation.en: Oh, yeah, right. Your secret's safe with me, you little sex monkey.
translation.zh:
好了，我不会说出去的
你这只性感的猴子

translation.en: I got sent to the principal today.
translation.zh: 我今天被送到校长办公室了

translation.en: Did you win a medal or something?
translation.zh: 你赢了什么奖之类的吗？

translation.en: Not exactly.
translation.zh: 不完全是

translation.en: I used inappropriate language in English class.
translation.zh: 我在英文课上讲了不得体的话

translation.en: Although we're reading a book that I personally deem...
translation.zh:
虽然我们正在读一本
我相信是...

translation.en: ...inappropriate for our age group, so I actually felt it was quite apropos.
translation.zh:
不适合我们这年纪读的
所以我觉得这行为也不会不得体

translation.en: What did you say?
translation.zh: 你说了什么？

translation.en: Let's just say it was an inappropriate word.
translation.zh: 就是...不得体的字眼

translation.en: Well, what did it start with?
translation.zh: 是什么引发的？

translation.en: A snide comment from a snotty girl in my class.
translation.zh:
我班上卑下的女生
发表了暗讽的言论

translation.en: No, I mean what letter did the word start with?
translation.zh: 不是，我是说那个字开头是什么字

translation.en: -T. -Oh, T.
translation.zh:
-T
-喔，T

translation.en: -T? Let us think. T, T, T. -T. All right, T. Yeah, T.
translation.zh:
-T？让我想想看
-T，就是T

translation.en: -T, T, T. -T, T, T.
translation.zh:
-T，T，T
-就是T

translation.en: -Guys. -Noun, adjective or verb?
translation.zh:
-听我说
-名词，形容词还是动词？

translation.en: Noun. It's definitely slang. Think British.
translation.zh:
名词，是个惯用语
英国人用的那种

translation.en: Tallywhacker? Termagant?
translation.zh: 坏蛋？坏女人？

translation.en: You're just saying sounds. Those are sounds.
translation.zh: 你只在模仿声音，这些只是声音

translation.en: -Spell it with your peas. -Yeah, spell it with your peas. Do it.
translation.zh:
-用你的豆子拼出来
-对，用你的豆子拼出来吧

translation.en: -I will take that challenge. -Do it.
translation.zh:
-我就拼出来喽
-快点

translation.en: I like that. All right.
translation.zh: 我喜欢，好吧

translation.en: So does this have anything to do with the rumor...
translation.zh: 所以这和那谣言有关吗？

translation.en: ...that you mentioned the other night?
translation.zh: 你前几天晚上说的

translation.en: Do you need to talk to us about something, sweetie?
translation.zh: 你需要和我们讲什么吗？甜心

translation.en: What's a twit?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: That's an A, honey.
translation.zh: 这是个A，甜心

translation.en: It'll get you sent to the principal's office.
translation.zh: 这是个字会把你送到校长办公室

translation.en: Sit down.
translation.zh: 坐下

translation.en: We're lucky that this is not a common occurrence.
translation.zh:
我们应该感到幸运
这种事情不常发生

translation.en: What would my punishment have been otherwise?
translation.zh: 还有什么其他的处罚？

translation.en: -Bed without supper, I guess. -But I'm already finished.
translation.zh:
-不吃晚饭直接上床之类的
-但是我已经吃完了

translation.en: -No dating. No dating. -Yeah, no dating.
translation.zh:
-不准约会，不准约会
-对，不准约会

translation.en: -No dating for you, young lady. -No dating.
translation.zh:
-不准约会了，年轻女孩
-不准约会

translation.en: I think my complete lack of allure...
translation.zh: 我想我一点也没有吸引力

translation.en: ...already kind of shot that horse in the face.
translation.zh: 那个可能性早已被断绝了

translation.en: I wouldn't know how to be grounded more than you know how to ground.
translation.zh:
我不知道要怎么被关在家里
因为我已经常待在家里了

translation.en: That's right. Love you. Come here.
translation.zh: 没错，爱你喔，过来这里

translation.en: And I bet that girl was acting like exactly what you called her.
translation.zh: 我敢说那女孩是自食其果

translation.en: Oh, you have no idea.
translation.zh: 你真的无法想像

translation.en: I got a B-plus on my spelling test today.
translation.zh: 我今天的拼字测验得到乙上

translation.en: That's good, honey, but everything has spell check these days, so....
translation.zh:
很不错，甜心
但是现在连电脑都有拼字检查

translation.en: Just kidding.
translation.zh: 我只是开玩笑的

translation.en: Where are you from originally?
translation.zh: 你最早是从哪里来的？

translation.en: So the next day I had detention...
translation.zh: 所以隔天我被留校察看

translation.en: ...which, thanks to recent budget cuts, meant cleaning.
translation.zh: 感谢预算被砍，指的是清洁

translation.en: I was looking forward to getting all this behind me.
translation.zh: 我很期待将所有事抛诸脑后

translation.en: I had done the crime. I was gonna do the time.
translation.zh: 我犯罪了但是也弥补过了

translation.en: And that would be that, but that....
translation.zh: 所有的事情都会是...

translation.en: Aren't there, like, child labor laws against this?
translation.zh:
难道不是有
禁止孩童劳工的法令吗？

translation.en: Not in high school.
translation.zh: 在高中里没有

translation.en: The principal's like the captain of the ship in international waters.
translation.zh: 校长就像是在公海上的船长

translation.en: He can even marry people.
translation.zh: 他可以娶任何人

translation.en: We haven't talked in a while. How have you been, Brandon?
translation.zh:
我们很久没有聊天了
你最近好吗？布兰登

translation.zh: 你们快来看

translation.en: She'll do stuff for money. Around the world....
translation.zh:
她为了钱什么都可以做
可以上天下海

translation.en: But for people who knew the truth, I was open for business.
translation.zh:
但对于知道实情的人
可以直接来和我接洽

translation.en: And whether I liked it or not, I had a lot of customers.
translation.zh:
枉顾我自身的意愿
我的生意可是非常兴隆

translation.en: Phil Lord gave me 100 bucks from Best Buy...
translation.zh:
菲尔罗德给我
一百元的电子产品礼券

translation.en: ...so he could tell people we hooked up behind the library.
translation.zh:
所以他可以跟别人说
他和我在图书馆后面搞上了

translation.en: I got $50 from T.J. Maxx so that Eric Ling could say...
translation.zh: 艾瑞克林恩给我50元的服饰礼券

translation.en: ...we got it on during Chemistry.
translation.zh: 所以他可以说我们在化学课时做了

translation.en: Ninety dollars from Panda Express so Ryan Dukes could tell people...
translation.zh: 雷恩杜克给我90元的中国菜礼券

translation.en: ...I showed him mine, but he did not show me his.
translation.zh:
所以他可以说他看了我的裸体
但他自己却没有脱

translation.en: Chris Miller, big spender that he is...
translation.zh: 克里斯米勒是个暴发户

translation.en: ...gave me $40 worth of movie passes for my pretend cowbell.
translation.zh:
给我价值40元的电影通行证
所以他可以说我在床上需索无度

translation.en: They had an expiration date and were only good...
translation.zh: 但是这个通行证有有效期限

translation.en: ...at the stupid foreign movie theater.
translation.zh: 而且只能拿来看愚蠢的外国电影

translation.en: Hi. One for Der Scharlachrote Buchstabe.
translation.zh: 你好，一张〝哄字〞的票

translation.en: But even that is better than Sanjay Chandrasekhar.
translation.zh: 但那都比桑及谦朵萨卡的好

translation.en: Seriously? A coupon? Twenty percent off to Bath & Body Works?
translation.zh:
你没搞错吗？折价券？
沐浴用品的八折券？

translation.en: Is that how much our imaginary tryst meant to you?
translation.zh: 我们想像的幽会只值这么一点点？

translation.en: I fake rocked your world.
translation.zh: 我在想像里可是让你乐得翻天覆地

translation.en: -It's all I can afford. -How's that my problem, amigo?
translation.zh:
-我只付得起这个
-干我屁事？

translation.en: I knew he wasn't Latino, but for some reason all these shady...
translation.zh:
我知道他不是拉丁裔
但这些见不得人的交易

translation.en: ...backdoor deals had me talking like Carlito.
translation.zh: 让我讲起话来就像个拉丁摔角选手

translation.en: -Beat it, ese. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-你快滚
-好

translation.en: Whatever happened to chivalry?
translation.zh: 骑士精神是否已荡然无存？

translation.en: Does it only exist in '80s movies?
translation.zh: 难到只存在80年代的电影里吗？

translation.en: I want John Cusack holding a boombox outside my window.
translation.zh:
我要约翰库萨克
拿着音响站在我的窗外

translation.en: I wanna ride off on a lawn mower with Patrick Dempsey.
translation.zh:
我要和派屈克丹普西
一起坐在锄草机上驰骋

translation.en: I want Jake from Sixteen Candles waiting outside the church for me.
translation.zh:
我要《Sixteen Candles》的杰克
在教堂外等我

translation.en: I want Judd Nelson thrusting his fist into the air...
translation.zh:
我要贾德尼尔森
向空中挥出喜悦的一拳

translation.en: ...because he knows he got me.
translation.zh: 因为他知道他已经拥有了我

translation.en: Just once, I want my life to be like an '80s movie.
translation.zh:
只要一次就好
我希望我的人生能像80年代电影

translation.en: Preferably one with a really awesome musical number...
translation.zh: 最好还有一群超酷的乐手

translation.en: ...for no apparent reason.
translation.zh: 并没有什么特别理由

translation.en: But, no. No. John Hughes did not direct my life.
translation.zh: 但我的人生并不是约翰休斯的电影

translation.en: So instead of all that...
translation.zh: 所以，我得到的不是那些情景

translation.en: ...I get to save 15 cents...
translation.zh: 而是一罐便宜15分的...

translation.en: ...on a bottle of Juniper Breeze Antibacterial Gel.
translation.zh: 杜松微风抗菌乳

translation.en: So if you're still with me, and I'm hoping that most of you are...
translation.zh:
如果你还没离场...
我希望你们都还在

translation.en: ...this brings us to part four.
translation.zh: 接下来将进入到第四阶段

translation.en: How I, Olive Penderghast, went from assumed trollop...
translation.zh:
我，奥莉薇潘德盖斯
是如何从一个伪荡妇

translation.en: ...to an actual home-wrecker.
translation.zh: 成为一个真正破坏家庭者

translation.en: -You wanted to see me? -I did. Why don't you come in here?
translation.zh:
-你要见我？
-对，请进

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 这是怎么一回事？

translation.en: -I'm accessorizing. -Really?
translation.zh: 我搭配了装饰配件 这样吗？

translation.en: I think you're taking your reading assignment a little bit too seriously.
translation.zh: 我想你对功课认真过头了

translation.en: Well, I was really hoping to get an A. Get it?
translation.zh:
我只是想要拿到A而已
你有听懂吗？

translation.en: I'm hearing some rumors.
translation.zh: 我听说了一些传闻

translation.en: Well, those are true. I am considering becoming an existentialist.
translation.zh:
都是真的
我正考虑要成为一个存在主义者

translation.en: -You know what I'm talking about. -Jeez.
translation.zh: 你知道我是什么意思

translation.en: When did teachers become privy to idle adolescent gossip?
translation.zh:
从什么时候开始连老师
都喜欢青少年的八卦了？

translation.en: That would be when everyone is putting everything up on Facebook.
translation.zh:
从所有人把所有事
都放在社群网站上开始

translation.en: I don't know what your generation's fascination is...
translation.zh:
我不知道你们这一代
为何如此沉迷于...

translation.en: ...with documenting your every thought...
translation.zh: 无时无刻记录你们所有的想法

translation.en: ...but I can assure you they're not all diamonds.
translation.zh: 但我知道那些可不是什么珍宝

translation.en: "Roman is having an okay day...
translation.zh: 〝罗门今天过得普普通通...

translation.en: ...and bought a Coke Zero at the gas station.
translation.zh: 在加油站买了一罐零卡可乐...

translation.en: Raise the roof."
translation.zh: 开始跳舞吧〞

translation.en: Who gives a rat's ass?
translation.zh: 干我屁事呀？

translation.en: He got a Coke Zero again?
translation.zh: 他又买了一罐零卡可乐？

translation.en: That Roman. Incorrigible.
translation.zh: 那个罗门真是无药可救了

translation.en: Listen, whatever this little act is about, I just-- I'm curious.
translation.zh:
无论你背后的动机如何
我只是很好奇

translation.en: I really think you should consider giving me extra credit...
translation.zh: 我认为你应该考虑帮我加分

translation.en: ...for going the extra mile.
translation.zh: 毕竟我付出了这么多

translation.en: I'm really attempting to understand this puritanical ostracism...
translation.zh: 就是为了要体会霍桑想表达的...

translation.en: -...Hawthorne wrote about. -You are one of the few that read it.
translation.zh: 清教徒式的排挤与放逐 你是少数几个真的看了书的学生

translation.en: If I read one more paper from one of your classmates...
translation.zh: 如果我再看到你们班有人写

translation.en: ...who talks about how hot she is in the bathtub, her fake British accent...
translation.zh:
黛米摩尔在浴缸里有多性感
她的英国腔有多假

translation.en: ...or, is she still married to Ashton Kutcher, I'm gonna kill myself.
translation.zh:
还是问她和艾希顿库奇离婚了没
我会马上自杀

translation.en: Why don't people just watch the original movie like I did?
translation.zh:
大家为什么不和我一样
看原版的电影呢？

translation.en: I know you read the book.
translation.zh: 我知道你有看书

translation.en: I did.
translation.zh: 我有看

translation.en: Listen, I want to apologize for sending you to the principal's office.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉我把你送去校长室

translation.en: Truthfully, and I'll deny it if you say anything...
translation.zh:
如果你跟别人提起，我会全盘否认
但老实说...

translation.en: ...I wanted to be cheering with the rest of the students.
translation.zh: 我真想和其他人一起为你欢呼

translation.en: I don't know what it is about Nina.
translation.zh: 我不知道妮娜是怎么一回事

translation.en: I hate her.
translation.zh: 我讨厌她

translation.en: I won't tell.
translation.zh: 我不会跟别人说的

translation.en: -I'll deny it if you do. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-如果你跟别人说，我会全盘否认
-好

translation.en: -Bye-bye. -Bye-bye.
translation.zh:
-再见
-再见

translation.en: Stay golden.
translation.zh: 要忠于自我

translation.en: -Hi, Mrs. Griffith. -Hi, you. How are you?
translation.zh:
-你好，葛利芬斯老师
-你好吗？

translation.en: A is for "awesome."
translation.zh: A代表棒透了的意思

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对呀

translation.en: I've never seen that girl before.
translation.zh: 我从没看过那个女孩

translation.en: That does not surprise me.
translation.zh: 我早料到了

translation.en: But I'm the guidance counselor. I should know all the students.
translation.zh:
但我是个辅导老师
我理当要认识所有学生

translation.en: Especially the ones who dress like prostitutes.
translation.zh: 尤其是那些穿得像性工作者的学生

translation.en: -It's good to see you. -Hey. How are you? Good.
translation.zh:
-真高兴你来了
-你好吗？很好

translation.en: No, stop. We're at school. There are rules.
translation.zh:
住手，我们还在学校里
学校有规矩

translation.en: -Windows. -Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh:
-还有窗户
-好吧

translation.en: Do me a favor, though. Just talk to her.
translation.zh: 帮我个忙，好吗？跟她谈谈

translation.en: I think she's going through a phase.
translation.zh: 我想她正处于转折点上

translation.en: That's not the girl everyone's talking about, is it?
translation.zh: 她就是大家议论纷纷的女孩吗？

translation.en: It is.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Oh, okay. Oh, this'll be good. All right.
translation.zh: 好好，没问题

translation.en: That snotty, Jesus-freak office aide I have...
translation.zh:
我办公室里那个
傲慢的耶稣狂热助理

translation.en: ...has been bitching about her incessantly.
translation.zh: 不停地在说她坏话

translation.en: They're all lies, but she could use somebody to talk to anyway.
translation.zh:
那些传言都是假的
有人能跟她谈谈是最好的

translation.en: All right. Hey, what are you doing for dinner tonight?
translation.zh: 好，对了，你今晚要吃什么？

translation.en: -You won't be there? -Sorry.
translation.zh:
-你不一起吃吗？
-对不起

translation.en: I have an after-school session. Kid brought a knife to school.
translation.zh:
我有个课后约谈
那孩子带刀子来学校

translation.en: Well, be careful, all right?
translation.zh: 好吧，小心一点

translation.en: It was a butter knife. But you know what they say.
translation.zh: 那只是把奶油刀，但大家都说...

translation.en: You know, it's a gateway knife, so....
translation.zh: 那总是一把刀子

translation.en: -All right, bye. -Yeah. Bye.
translation.zh:
-好，再见
-再见

translation.en: I'm thinking about another gateway. It's a....
translation.zh: 我想的是另一种，是...

translation.en: Making spaghetti.
translation.zh: 我今晚要做意大利面

translation.en: -That's great. -With meat.
translation.zh:
-很好
-还有肉

translation.en: Enjoy eating your meat.
translation.zh: 请好好享用你的肉

translation.en: -And balls. -Enjoy eating your balls.
translation.zh:
-还有丸子
-请好好享用你的丸子

translation.en: Sharpening your pencils?
translation.zh: 削铅笔吗？

translation.en: Getting them nice and sharp?
translation.zh: 削得又好又尖吗？

translation.en: Sharpening them up? Look at you. Look at you. So sharp.
translation.zh: 削铅笔吗？看看你，削得多好

translation.en: Sharpening those pencils. Sharp, sharp, sharp.
translation.zh: 削铅笔，削削削

translation.en: -God, that's sharp. I-- -Hey, Olive. You ready to come in?
translation.zh:
-天呀，这么尖，我...
-奥莉薇，准备好了吗？

translation.en: Good job.
translation.zh: 做得好

translation.en: Well, the reason I called you in was just so we could...
translation.zh: 我请你来只是要...

translation.en: ...sort of, you know, just chat about what's going on.
translation.zh: 和你聊聊最近的事

translation.en: You know, there is concern from a few faculty members.
translation.zh: 有些老师很担心你

translation.en: Your husband.
translation.zh: 你是说你先生吧

translation.en: Olive, you're attempting to make a statement.
translation.zh: 奥莉薇，你想要表达自己的立场

translation.en: I'm just a little confused as to what exactly that is.
translation.zh: 但我搞不清你的立场是什么

translation.en: Am I in trouble?
translation.zh: 我有麻烦了吗？

translation.en: Because, pursuant to the student code of conduct...
translation.zh: 因为...依据学生手册规定

translation.en: ...my hemline has never been higher than my fingertips.
translation.zh: 我的裙摆从未短于我的指尖

translation.en: No, you're not in trouble.
translation.zh: 不，你没有惹上什么麻烦

translation.en: I wanted to make sure you knew...
translation.zh: 我只是要你知道...

translation.en: ...if there's something that you wanna talk about...
translation.zh: 如果你想要找人谈谈

translation.en: ...you know, you can trust me.
translation.zh: 你可以相信我

translation.en: If I open up to you, do you promise this stays in confidence?
translation.zh:
如果我对你坦承
你能答应帮我保密吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I'm-- See? I'm the guidance counselor.
translation.zh: 当然，你看，我是辅导老师

translation.en: That's what I do.
translation.zh: 这是我的专长

translation.en: I mean, I have a reputation to uphold.
translation.zh: 我必需维护我的名声

translation.en: Don't you, though?
translation.zh: 可不是吗？

translation.en: All right, listen, don't tell anyone I'm doing this, please.
translation.zh: 听着，别跟任何人说我给你这个

translation.en: Here you go.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: -Here you go. -I really don't need those.
translation.zh:
-给你的
-我不需要

translation.en: Oh, you really do. Here you go.
translation.zh: 你需要的，拿去吧

translation.en: Here you go. Okay?
translation.zh: 收下吧

translation.en: I just don't want this thing you're going through to define your life.
translation.zh:
我不希望你现在所经历的这一切
会对你人生造成重大影响

translation.en: Olive, do what you gotta do. Okay?
translation.zh: 奥莉薇，做你该做的

translation.en: Let your freak flag fly. Just make sure you have an exit strategy.
translation.zh:
尽情地作怪
但要确保你能全身而退

translation.en: Listen, Mrs. Griffith, I really-- I don't need these.
translation.zh:
葛利芬斯老师
我真的不需要这个

translation.en: The pill is not 100 percent effective.
translation.zh: 这些药丸并不是完全有效用

translation.en: Ask some of your friends' parents.
translation.zh: 问你朋友的爸妈就知道了

translation.en: Thank you for coming in.
translation.zh: 谢谢你今天过来

translation.en: Can you just send in the next person? Thank you.
translation.zh:
你可以帮我请下一位学生进来吗？
谢谢

translation.en: You're up, hoss.
translation.zh: 换你了，豪斯

translation.en: Okay. Go. It's all right.
translation.zh: 去吧，没事的

translation.en: Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 一切都会没事的

translation.en: Don't you think it's a little strange that your boyfriend is 22 years old...
translation.zh: 你不觉得你男朋友已经22岁了...

translation.en: -...and still in high school? -Not that it's any of your business...
translation.zh:
-却还在念高中很奇怪吗？
-这不关你的事

translation.en: ...but he is here by choice.
translation.zh: 而且他是自愿留下的

translation.en: It's his choice he's a fourth-year senior that can't pass any test he takes?
translation.zh:
他是自愿选择读了四年高三
而且所有科目都被当掉的吗？

translation.en: His choice. His? His?
translation.zh: 是他的旨意，他的，他的

translation.en: Capital H?
translation.zh: 示部的〝他〞

translation.en: If God wanted him to graduate, God would've given him the right answers.
translation.zh:
如果上帝要他毕业
便会显示正确答案的指引给他

translation.en: I'm sorry. You gotta be shitting me, woman.
translation.zh: 对不起，你是在开我玩笑吧？

translation.en: Okay. So why was he blubbering like a baby?
translation.zh: 那为什么他刚刚和小孩一样啜泣？

translation.en: -Is he struggling with his sexuality? -No, you insensitive rhymes-with-witch.
translation.zh:
-他无法确定自己的性向吗？
-才不是，你这个巫婆

translation.en: His parents are going through a divorce.
translation.zh: 是他的父母要离婚了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You know, sometimes our boyfriend's parents...
translation.zh: 大家男朋友的父母...

translation.en: ...they get divorced, you know?
translation.zh: 难免是会离婚的

translation.en: And it's important to remember it's not your fault.
translation.zh: 你要记住，这并不是你的错

translation.en: So I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我得走了

translation.en: But they go to our church. What will people say?
translation.zh:
但我们上同一间教堂
其他人会怎么说闲话？

translation.en: How long do these embraces usually last? Because I gotta go, but I--
translation.zh:
你通常抱一次要抱多久？
我真的得走了

translation.en: -Are you gonna be okay? -Yes, I'm gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 你不会有事吧？ 我没事的

translation.en: Mrs. Griffith is amazing...
translation.zh: 葛利芬斯老师超棒的

translation.en: ...and she's gonna help Micah, and everything's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 她会帮助米凯度过难关

translation.en: See? All right, that's the spirit. Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.zh:
没错，就是这个精神
一切会没事的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Wait. Why are you even being so nice to me?
translation.zh: 等一下，你为什么对我这么好？

translation.en: I did it.
translation.zh: 我做到了

translation.en: I got through to you.
translation.zh: 我终于打动你了

translation.en: I'm so sorry about everything I said. I am so, so sorry.
translation.zh:
我为我从前说过的话道歉
我好抱歉

translation.en: I mean, I really want us to be friends. Can we please be friends?
translation.zh:
我想和你成为好朋友
我们可以当朋友吗？

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: And for a day, we were actually really good friends.
translation.zh: 有一天，我们就像知己一样

translation.en: I was kind of starting to think things were gonna turn around.
translation.zh: 我开始觉得一切将会渐渐好转

translation.en: Olive!
translation.zh: 奥莉薇

translation.en: -Friend. -Hey, friend.
translation.zh:
-我的朋友
-我的朋友

translation.en: -I missed you. -Oh, I missed you more.
translation.zh:
-我想你
-我更想你

translation.en: She texted me in first period.
translation.zh: 她在第一堂课就传讯息给我

translation.en: By second period, we apparently had private jokes.
translation.zh:
到了第二节课
我们已经培养出密友的默契了

translation.en: Olive. Olive.
translation.zh: 奥莉薇，奥莉薇

translation.en: Tragedy struck in Wood Shop.
translation.zh: 但工艺课时发生了一件悲剧

translation.en: It wasn't because someone sawed off a thumb...
translation.zh: 不是有人的拇指断了

translation.en: ...which has happened.
translation.zh: 虽然这确实发生过

translation.en: Micah is in the hospital. He is in so much pain.
translation.zh: 是米凯疼痛不止住院了

translation.en: The nurse didn't know what was wrong.
translation.zh: 但护士不知道病因

translation.en: There, there.
translation.zh: 好了，好了

translation.en: It hurts so bad, Mommy.
translation.zh: 妈妈，我好痛

translation.en: Well, it's just what I thought. Chlamydia.
translation.zh: 跟我想的一样，是衣原体感染

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: Who have you been screwing? Tell me.
translation.zh: 你在和谁乱搞，快跟我说

translation.en: Tell me now or I will kill you right here.
translation.zh: 快说不然我杀了你

translation.en: Olive. Olive Penderghast!
translation.zh: 是奥莉薇潘德盖斯

translation.en: Olive. Olive Penderghast.
translation.zh: 奥莉薇潘德盖斯

translation.en: I have to call you back. Okay. Bye-bye.
translation.zh: 我再回你电话，再见

translation.en: Goddamn it.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Chlamydia?!
translation.zh: 衣原体感染？

translation.en: That bitch!
translation.zh: 那个荡妇

translation.en: -Olive? -Hey.
translation.zh:
-奥莉薇
-嗨

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Goddamn it.
translation.zh: 天呀，天呀，好痛

translation.en: I panicked.
translation.zh: 我乱了手脚

translation.en: I said I got it from Olive Penderghast.
translation.zh:
所以就说是奥莉薇潘德盖斯
传染给我的

translation.en: I know, but what was I supposed to say?
translation.zh: 我知道，不然我要说谁？

translation.en: You know, and then my mom tells Marianne's mom.
translation.zh: 然后我妈告诉了玛莉安的妈妈

translation.en: I did. I tried to blame it on their divorce...
translation.zh: 我有，我说都是他们离婚的错

translation.en: ...but my mom is not buying it.
translation.zh: 但我妈不相信我

translation.en: That's it. I have to tell them.
translation.zh: 就这样，我要说实话

translation.en: No, I do not care that you gave me chlamydia. I don't!
translation.zh: 我不在意你把衣原体传染给我

translation.en: I love you and I want to be with you, and nobody can stop us.
translation.zh:
我爱你，我要和你在一起
没有人可以阻止我们

translation.en: Not my mother, not Marianne, and not even the school board...
translation.zh:
我妈妈不行，玛莉安也不行
校董也不行

translation.en: ...or the president of the Americas!
translation.zh: 甚至美国总统也不能阻止我们

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 天呀

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 天呀

translation.en: What? What do you want? What do you want?
translation.zh: 干嘛？你想怎样？你想怎样？

translation.en: Just go.
translation.zh: 走开

translation.en: Perfect. Just perfect.
translation.zh: 这真是太棒了

translation.en: I'm sorry, I just-- I was looking for Marianne.
translation.zh: 对不起，我只是要找玛莉安

translation.en: Did she say anything about being mad at me?
translation.zh: 她有说她在生我的气吗？

translation.en: She just smacked the bejesus out of me.
translation.zh: 因为她刚刚狠狠甩了我一巴掌

translation.en: No, that's my fault. I'm so sorry, Olive. I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
不，是我的错
奥莉薇，对不起

translation.en: But I messed up, okay? I just goddamn shit...
translation.zh: 我搞砸了，好吗？我他妈的...

translation.en: ...goddamn messed up really goddamn shit bad.
translation.zh: 我他妈的彻底毁了

translation.en: Goddamn. Shit, goddamn.
translation.zh: 该死，该死

translation.en: Okay. Don't get me wrong because I love it...
translation.zh:
不要误会我的意思
我喜欢你说话的态度

translation.en: ...but I don't think you're supposed to use that language in front of a student.
translation.zh:
但我想你身为老师
并不适合对学生说刚刚那些话

translation.en: You know what else you're not supposed to do, is sleep with them.
translation.zh: 身为老师也不应该和学生发生关系

translation.en: But that didn't stop me. Goddamn shit.
translation.zh: 但我却没有因此而有顾忌，该死

translation.en: Wait. You-- Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 等等，你...天呀

translation.en: But I'm not-- I'm not judging you or anything, but, oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我没有看不起你，只是...天呀

translation.en: I-- Wait, what does that have to do with me?
translation.zh: 我... 等一下，这和我有什么关系？

translation.en: You should know that my marriage is not great.
translation.zh: 我的婚姻并不美满

translation.en: We haven't slept together in months.
translation.zh: 我们有好几个月没做了

translation.en: In months, all right?
translation.zh: 好几个月了

translation.en: Finally, this great-looking guy comes in and he's nice to me, you know?
translation.zh: 终于有一个长得帅又温柔的学生

translation.en: And he's not a minor.
translation.zh: 而且他已经成年了

translation.en: This is legal. It's legal because he's been here forever, okay?
translation.zh:
这是合法的，合法的
他在这个高中待超久了

translation.en: He's not the sharpest Christian in the Bible, all right?
translation.zh: 他并不是个聪明的基督徒

translation.en: And then he finds out that he has chlamydia.
translation.zh: 然后他发现他感染了衣原体

translation.en: And so then he's telling everybody that it was you.
translation.zh: 他告诉大家是你传染给他的

translation.en: He didn't want me to lose my job...
translation.zh: 他不想我因此丢了工作

translation.en: ...and he doesn't wanna get in trouble either, so he said it's you.
translation.zh:
他也不想因此惹上麻烦
所以只好说了是你

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: But I'll-- I'm gonna fix it, Olive. Okay? I'll tell everyone.
translation.zh:
但我会处理这一切的，奥莉薇
我会说出实情

translation.en: I'm gonna tell everyone that it's me. Okay? I'll just-- I'll lose my job.
translation.zh:
我会跟大家说其实是我
好吗？我会丢了工作

translation.en: And, you know, whatever else I lose, and then that's okay.
translation.zh: 也会失去其他东西，但没关系

translation.en: Maybe it was becoming a habit of mine to help the downtrodden...
translation.zh:
我想我已经养成了
帮助孤苦无援的人的习惯

translation.en: ...or maybe I just couldn't stand to see...
translation.zh: 也或者是因为我无法忍受...

translation.en: ...my favorite teacher's marriage crumble.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢的老师的婚姻因此破碎

translation.en: Either way, I decided to help.
translation.zh: 无论如何，我决定要帮她

translation.en: I could have chlamydia.
translation.zh: 我可以有衣原体

translation.en: I mean, I could have easily given it to Micah.
translation.zh: 我可以传染给米凯

translation.en: I mean, who knows?
translation.zh: 谁猜得到呢？

translation.en: Women oftentimes don't show symptoms.
translation.zh: 女生常常感染了却没有症状

translation.en: And the whole world knows I've been whoring around.
translation.zh: 而且全世界都知道我是个荡妇

translation.en: No, you haven't. No, you haven't.
translation.zh: 不，你没有，你没有

translation.en: Because a real whore can't admit it to herself, much less others. Trust me.
translation.zh:
真正的荡妇不敢面对自己
更不用说是其他人了，相信我

translation.en: Call Micah.
translation.zh: 打电话给米凯

translation.en: Tell him he is an ass and he owes me so big for this, but also...
translation.zh:
跟他说他是个混蛋
而且他欠我很大一笔

translation.en: ...tell him I confessed to giving him chlamydia.
translation.zh:
跟他说我承认
是我把衣原体传染给他的

translation.en: Getting a lot of hugs today.
translation.zh: 大家今天都想抱我

translation.en: -You're going to hell, Olive! -Get out of here!
translation.zh: 奥莉薇，你会下地狱

translation.en: I guess I shouldn't be too shocked these people...
translation.zh: （奥莉薇潘德盖斯是荡妇） 我早应该料到会有这群人

translation.en: ...wanted my diseased ass out of there.
translation.zh: 要把我赶出去

translation.en: Save yourself, Olive.
translation.zh: 拯救你自己吧，奥莉薇

translation.en: The funny thing is, the whole time this all was going down...
translation.zh: 好笑的是，在这整个过程中

translation.en: ...I couldn't help but think I could've come up with better signs.
translation.zh:
我想的居然是换成是我
一定可以想出更好的标语

translation.en: You gotta love the Quiznos guy.
translation.zh:
但你不得不喜欢
奎斯诺餐厅那家伙

translation.en: That's the one thing that trumps religion: capitalism.
translation.zh: 毕竟资本主义才是王道

translation.en: Why are you doing this?
translation.zh: 你为什么要这样做？

translation.en: I'm trying to make this school a better place.
translation.zh: 我想让这间学校变得更好

translation.en: Start a petition to get rid of the lead paint.
translation.zh: 难道就不能请愿抗议含铅涂料？

translation.en: New Honey Chicken at Quiznos.
translation.zh: 奎斯诺新发售蜂蜜鸡肉三明治

translation.en: -Not now, Quiznos. -You're a slut.
translation.zh:
-别吵，奎斯诺
-你是个荡妇

translation.en: You're going down, Olive.
translation.zh: 你完蛋了，奥莉薇

translation.en: If this is because I'm more popular than you, then I think what you're--
translation.zh: 如果是因为我比你受欢迎

translation.en: Let's not mistake popularity for infamy.
translation.zh: 别把恶名昭彰跟大受欢迎搞混了

translation.en: -You don't wanna burn, do you? -I'll be praying for you.
translation.zh:
-你不想体验地狱之火吧？
-我会为你祈祷的

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: -You okay? -Yeah. I'm awesome. I'm awesome.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-我真是好极了

translation.en: Screw all these people, Olive.
translation.zh: 去他们的，奥莉薇

translation.en: Haven't you heard?
translation.zh: 你没听说吗？

translation.en: I already did.
translation.zh: 我已经〝去〞过了

translation.en: -You're going to hell, Olive! -What you're doing is wrong.
translation.zh:
-你会下地狱的
-你的所作所为是错的

translation.en: You're going to hell!
translation.zh: 你会下地狱的

translation.en: So they got Rhiannon.
translation.zh: 瑞雅娜现在站在他们那一边

translation.en: Never underestimate the power of extremists like Marianne.
translation.zh:
永远别小看像玛莉安
这种激进份子的力量

translation.en: They sense any weakness, they pounce like jungle cats.
translation.zh: 看到任何弱点，就像恶虎扑羊一样

translation.en: And the whack pack just gets bigger and bigger.
translation.zh: 那些穷追猛打的声浪越来越大

translation.en: But at least they have a pack.
translation.zh: 但至少他们是一群人

translation.en: I was used to being by myself, but I had never felt more alone.
translation.zh:
我过去很习惯做自己
但从没感到这么孤单

translation.en: I thought I should look into what they were running around thumping about.
translation.zh:
我心想自己应该查一下
他们抨击我的话

translation.en: -Do you have a religion section? -It's over there.
translation.zh:
-你们有宗教书籍区吗？
-就在那里

translation.en: -Can I help you with something? -The Bible.
translation.zh:
-我能帮你什么忙吗？
-我要找圣经

translation.en: That's in bestsellers, right next to Twilight.
translation.zh:
最佳销量书籍
就在《Twilight》旁边

translation.en: I didn't have time to read the whole thing...
translation.zh: 我没有时间看完整本书

translation.en: ...because it's, like, 600 pages.
translation.zh: 因为它大概有600页吧

translation.en: Single-spaced.
translation.zh: 每行之间还没有空格

translation.en: And as every war that's ever been fought can tell you...
translation.zh: 就像每场抗战一样

translation.en: ...there are many ways you can interpret it.
translation.zh: 你可以用许多方式来解读

translation.en: Except the Civil War. That was pure racism.
translation.zh: 只除了南北战争，纯粹是种族歧视

translation.en: So I went to find an expert.
translation.zh: 所以我去找了专家

translation.en: But really, I just kind of wanted someone to talk to.
translation.zh: 但其实我只是想找人说说话

translation.en: Forgive me, Father, for I have sinned.
translation.zh: 神父，请原谅我，我有罪

translation.en: I think that's how you start these things.
translation.zh: 我想应该是这样开头吧

translation.en: I'm just going off what I've seen in movies.
translation.zh: 我学电影上那样

translation.en: Where do I even start?
translation.zh: 该从哪说起呢？

translation.en: I've been pretending to be....
translation.zh: 我一直假装...

translation.en: What is the Catholic way of phrasing this?
translation.zh: 不知道天主教是怎么形容

translation.en: A harlot?
translation.zh: 人尽可夫？

translation.en: A harlot. It's not that I've actually been doing...
translation.zh:
我一直以来做的事
其实并不是像那些人

translation.en: ...the things that people have been saying I've been doing...
translation.zh: 说的那样人尽可夫

translation.en: ...but then again, I'm not denying them either.
translation.zh: 但我也没有否认

translation.en: So I was just wondering, is that wrong?
translation.zh: 我很好奇这样做有错吗？

translation.en: It's just that a lot of people have been asking me to do things...
translation.zh: 很多人要求我做一些事情

translation.en: ...and I thought it was okay because it wasn't real, you know?
translation.zh: 我以为没关系，反正又不是真的

translation.en: It was make-believe.
translation.zh: 实际上是虚构的

translation.en: And no one was getting hurt...
translation.zh: 没有人因此受伤

translation.en: ...but a lot of people hate me now.
translation.zh: 但现在有很多人讨厌我

translation.en: I kind of hate me too.
translation.zh: 我也有点讨厌自己

translation.en: I might be wrong...
translation.zh: 也许我没搞清楚状况

translation.en: ...but aren't you supposed to say something?
translation.zh: 你是不是该说点什么？

translation.en: Tell me to say 10 Hail Marys, pay a fine...
translation.zh:
要我念圣母经10遍
付个罚款什么的

translation.en: ...advance token to nearest railroad? Hello?
translation.zh: 直接前往最近的火车站?有人吗？

translation.en: Should've seen that one coming.
translation.zh: 我早该知道

translation.en: Luckily, I live in a town with many different places of worship.
translation.zh:
很幸运地，我住的小镇
有许多不同地方可以祈祷

translation.en: So I went to find one with a real live human being.
translation.zh: 所以我去找了个有活人的地方

translation.en: Can I help you?
translation.zh: 有什么事吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I was just wondering if there's a minister around.
translation.zh: 我想知道这里有没有传教士

translation.en: Is it not a minister?
translation.zh: 不是叫传教士？

translation.en: A Reverend? A wizard?
translation.zh: 神父？巫师？

translation.en: It's a pastor, and he's here.
translation.zh: 是牧师，他在

translation.en: How can I help you today?
translation.zh: 今天我能帮你什么忙吗？

translation.en: I was wondering what your church's stance on lying and adultery was.
translation.zh:
我想知道你的教堂
对说谎与通奸有什么看法

translation.en: It's not a good thing.
translation.zh: 不是件好事

translation.en: Oh, I agree, wholeheartedly. But, then-- Now, tell me this.
translation.zh: 我完全同意，但是请告诉我

translation.en: Assuming there is a hell....
translation.zh: 假设真有地狱...

translation.en: Oh, the Christian Church recognizes the existence of hell.
translation.zh: 基督教教堂承认地狱的存在

translation.en: Okay, so we'll just say there's a "hell."
translation.zh: 所以我们可以直接说有地狱

translation.en: There is. Just so we're clear.
translation.zh: 原来真的有，明白了

translation.en: -Okay. So for argument's sake-- -No, there's no argument. It's there.
translation.zh:
-就辩论的立场来看
-无庸置疑，的确是有

translation.en: Right below our feet, right above the Orient. It's there.
translation.zh:
就在我们脚下，东方之上
确实就在那里

translation.en: Then what would be worse, lying or adultery?
translation.zh: 哪个比较糟糕，说谎还是通奸？

translation.en: Or is lying about adultery just like double whammy? Sorry.
translation.zh: 还是谎称通奸有双倍刑责？抱歉

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 不会吧

translation.en: I'm sorry, what did you say your name was?
translation.zh: 抱歉，你说你叫什么名字？

translation.en: I didn't. I-- You know what? I'm just gonna--
translation.zh:
我没说...你知道吗？
我想我还是...

translation.en: I'm just gonna go check out Judaism because--
translation.zh: 我还是去看一下犹太教好了

translation.en: -God. Two frames, really? -Sorry.
translation.zh:
-老天，两次了，不会吧
-抱歉

translation.en: The Jews and I have a lot in common.
translation.zh: 犹太人跟我有许多共通点

translation.en: -Just fashion-wise and stuff. -Off you go.
translation.zh:
-像是对流行的敏锐度等等
-你去吧

translation.en: Yes, I had unwittingly sought advice from the father...
translation.zh: 没错，我在不知情的情况下

translation.en: ...of the leader of my lynch mob.
translation.zh: 找上猎捕我的暴徒首领父亲咨询

translation.en: What other complete and total idiot can say that's happened to them?
translation.zh:
还有哪个人敢说他们像我一样
白痴到了极点？

translation.en: Okay, I've narrowed it down to The Other Boleyn Girl...
translation.zh:
我现在将范围缩小到
《The Other Boleyn Girl》

translation.en: ...or The Bucket List. Huge hit.
translation.zh: 或是大受欢迎的《Bucket List》

translation.en: Why can't we watch a movie for kids? You always get to pick.
translation.zh:
为什么不能看小孩子的电影？
每次都是你选

translation.en: Because the Family Member of the Week gets to pick the movie.
translation.zh: 因为当本周模范家庭成员可以选电影

translation.en: Yeah, but you get Family Member of the Week every week.
translation.zh: 但每周你都是当本周模范家庭成员

translation.en: And there's a reason for that.
translation.zh: 那是有原因的

translation.en: Yeah. You pick Family Member of the Week.
translation.zh:
当然啦，每周模范家庭成员
都是你选出来的

translation.en: Are you accusing me of nepotism?
translation.zh: 你是说我不公正？

translation.en: Okay, it's The Bucket List. This is it. This is the greatest decision.
translation.zh:
好，就选《Bucket List》
选定了，最棒的决定

translation.en: I'm so happy with this decision. That's what it's going to be.
translation.zh:
我对这项决定感到很满意
就这么定了

translation.en: All right, now, honey, after we watch The Bucket List...
translation.zh:
好，亲爱的
我们看完《Bucket List》后

translation.en: ...remember to cross "Watch The Bucket List" off our bucket list.
translation.zh:
记得要要将这部电影
从玩到挂清单上划掉

translation.en: Guys.
translation.zh: 大伙们

translation.en: I want you to know that if you hear I have chlamydia, that is totally false.
translation.zh:
我要你们知道，若是听说
我得了性病，完全没有这回事

translation.en: Olive, do we need to have the talk again?
translation.zh: 奥莉薇，我们需要再谈谈吗？

translation.en: No. It's just a thing that's going around.
translation.zh: 不用，只是谣言而已

translation.en: You know, nothing you're saying is making me feel any better.
translation.zh:
不管你怎么说
都不会让我感到好过

translation.en: Not to mention how you've been dressing the last few days.
translation.zh: 更别提你过去几天的穿着打扮

translation.en: No judgment, but you look like a stripper.
translation.zh:
没有批评的意思
但你看起来像脱衣舞娘

translation.en: -Mom. -A high-end stripper.
translation.zh:
-妈妈
-高级的那种

translation.en: For governors or athletes.
translation.zh: 跳给州长或运动员看的那种

translation.en: But stripper, nonetheless.
translation.zh: 但还是脱衣舞娘

translation.en: Oh, my God. I'm just trying to mix it up a little.
translation.zh:
我的天啊
我只是走混搭路线而已

translation.en: And I have no STDs, I promise you.
translation.zh: 我向你们保证，我没有得性病

translation.en: Oh, that's great. Daughter of the Year.
translation.zh: 好极了，本年度模范女儿

translation.en: If you hear anything to the contrary...
translation.zh: 若你们听到的不是这样

translation.en: ...come up with some funny retort and walk away.
translation.zh: 狠狠反击回去，掉头就走

translation.en: Honey, you're kind of starting to worry us a little.
translation.zh:
亲爱的，你这个样子
让我们有点担心

translation.en: Should we be kind of worried a little?
translation.zh: 我们应该要担心吗？

translation.en: I don't think so.
translation.zh: 我不这样认为

translation.en: -You sure? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你确定？
-对

translation.en: Yeah. I got it all under control.
translation.zh: 一切都在我掌握之中

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-好吧
-好吧

translation.en: Then let's Bucket List this bitch.
translation.zh: 那么我们就来欣赏《Bucket List》

translation.en: The Bucket List, The Bucket List.
translation.zh: 《Bucket List》

translation.en: To say this whole thing had taken over my life...
translation.zh: 说这整件事影响我的生活

translation.en: ...would be a colossal understatement.
translation.zh: 还太保守了一点

translation.en: I actually reread The Scarlet Letter to see how Hester dealt with it.
translation.zh:
我重新借了
《The Scarlet Letter》 想看海丝特如何面对

translation.en: And it turns out she bore her punishment in humble silence...
translation.zh: 结果她在卑微的沉默中承受惩罚

translation.en: ...which are two concepts I am not comfortable with.
translation.zh: 我无法接受这两项观点

translation.en: With all the mythical play I was getting...
translation.zh: 纵然我尽力演出

translation.en: ...I still actually hadn't been asked out on a real date.
translation.zh: 还是没有人真的约我出去

translation.en: People were jumping up and down to say they'd slept with me...
translation.zh: 大家四处宣传他们跟我上过床

translation.en: ...but no one bothered really trying to sleep with me.
translation.zh: 但没有人真的想跟我上床

translation.en: I was starting to think I actually did have a gnome down there.
translation.zh: 我开始觉得我下面有只守护神

translation.en: -Until finally.... -Hey, Olive.
translation.zh:

translation.zh: 葛利芬斯老师，若你有看到

translation.en: ...just know that I was wrong to tell you that in that way. At all.
translation.zh:
我只想让你知道
我不该以那种方式告诉你

translation.en: I shouldn't have done it.
translation.zh: 我不该那么做

translation.en: And I don't even feel bad for lying for your wife.
translation.zh: 我甚至不后悔帮你太太撒谎

translation.en: But I hate myself for telling you the truth. I am so sorry.
translation.zh:
但我恨自己告诉你实情
我真的很抱歉

translation.en: With my words, even though they were true, I ended a marriage.
translation.zh:
即使我说的话是真的
我却亲手结束了一段婚姻

translation.en: Looking back, that's the thing I regret the most.
translation.zh:
回首过去
那是我最后悔的一件事

translation.en: So now everyone that knows the truth is either gone or they won't fess up.
translation.zh:
现在知道真相的人
不是离开，就是不肯挺身而出

translation.en: And Marianne Bryant and her disciples are demanding my head.
translation.zh:
而玛莉安布莱恩与她的信徒
很想要我死

translation.en: The messed-up thing is I would not put it past Principal Gibbons to expel me.
translation.zh:
麻烦的是我怎么做才不会
让吉布森校长开除我

translation.en: I had a similar situation when I was your age.
translation.zh:
我在你这的年纪时
也有类似的遭遇

translation.en: What? Everyone called you a slut?
translation.zh: 什么？大家叫你荡妇？

translation.en: I had a horrible reputation and people said awful things about me.
translation.zh: 我的名声很糟，大家都说我坏话

translation.en: -Why? -Because I was a slut.
translation.zh:
-为什么？
-因为我是个荡妇

translation.en: I slept with a whole bunch of people. A slew, a heap, a peck. Mostly guys.
translation.zh:
我跟一堆人上床，很多、许多
非常多，大部份是男生

translation.en: -Mom. -Sorry, I got around.
translation.zh:
-妈妈
-抱歉，我四处交际

translation.en: Before I met Dad, I had incredibly low self-worth.
translation.zh:
在遇见你爸爸之前
我极端没有自信

translation.en: Do me a favor and just stuff this down my throat until I asphyxiate to death.
translation.zh:
帮我个忙，帮我把这个塞到喉咙里
直到我窒息而死

translation.en: -It's true. It is. -I want to die.
translation.zh:
-是真的
-我想死

translation.en: It's true. I was quite the contortionist.
translation.zh: 是真的，我当时身体很柔软

translation.en: I could do this thing. I could go-- I mean, my leg all the way--
translation.zh: 我可以这样做，把我的腿抬上...

translation.en: Stop. Can you stop? Don't show me.
translation.zh: 住手，你住手好吗？别表演给我看

translation.en: -Can you not see that I'm a mess? -No, you're not, Olive.
translation.zh:
-你看不出来我现在是一团糟吗？
-不，你不是，奥莉薇

translation.en: You're wonderful.
translation.zh: 你很棒

translation.en: And you'll handle this the same way I did.
translation.zh: 你会用我过去相同的方式来处理

translation.en: With an incontrovertible sense of humor.
translation.zh: 不容置疑的幽默感

translation.en: But you're much smarter than I am...
translation.zh: 但你比我聪明多了

translation.en: ...so you'll come out of this much better than I did.
translation.zh: 所以你的结果，也会比我好的多

translation.en: Thank you, Mom.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，妈妈

translation.en: -I could get my leg so far back. -No, no, no. Stop it.
translation.zh:
-我的脚可以抬得很后面
-不...住手

translation.en: So it was time to put an end to all this once and for all...
translation.zh: 该是说出我这一方的故事...

translation.en: ...by telling my side of the story.
translation.zh: 一口气将这件事结束的时候了

translation.en: And that's why I decided to do this webcast.
translation.zh:
这就是我决定要做
这次网络直播的原因

translation.en: So here we go.
translation.zh: 所以我们开始吧

translation.en: Part five.
translation.zh: 第五部

translation.en: Not with a fizzle, but with a bang.
translation.zh: 不是小雨点，而是狂风暴雨

translation.en: Today we had yet another one of our ridiculous pep rallies.
translation.zh: 今天又将举办一场荒唐的鼓舞大会

translation.en: Todd convinced the band to play the sexiest song in their repertoire.
translation.zh:
陶德说服乐团演奏他们曲目中
最性感的一首歌

translation.en: I needed to pique everyone's interest to get them to go home and log on.
translation.zh:
我需要引起大家的兴趣
让他们回家登入网页

translation.en: I had one outfit left and I figured about 30 seconds to do it.
translation.zh:
我只剩一套服装
我想我有30秒的时间

translation.en: Plus I really wanted my own awesome musical number...
translation.zh:
加上我真的很想自己演出
一场精彩的歌舞剧

translation.en: ...for no apparent reason.
translation.zh: 原因不明

translation.en: Is that Olive?
translation.zh: 那是奥莉薇吗？

translation.en: This was just a free preview.
translation.zh: 以上为免费预告

translation.en: For the main event, log on to www.FreeOlive.com tonight at 6 p.m.
translation.zh:
主要内容，请于晚上六点
上网登入www.FreeOlive.com

translation.en: And I know it interferes with the basketball game but, come on...
translation.zh:
我知道跟篮球赛会有冲突
但是你们想想

translation.en: ...would you rather cheer on the Woodchucks...
translation.zh: 是要对着土拨鼠欢呼

translation.en: ...or watch me do one?
translation.zh: 还是看我表演？

translation.en: What do you think you're doing? Get to my office right now.
translation.zh:
你以为你在做什么？
马上到我办公室

translation.en: I can't, because I have a date with the guy I like and the rest of the school.
translation.zh:
不行，因为我跟我喜欢的男生
以及全校有约

translation.en: I think before you expel me, you might wanna talk to Mrs. Griffith...
translation.zh:
在你开除我之前，你也许会
想葛利芬斯老师谈谈

translation.en: ...because I think she might talk you into letting me stay.
translation.zh: 因为我想她也许会说服你让我留下

translation.en: Go, Woodchucks!
translation.zh: 加油，土拨鼠

translation.en: And here you all are...
translation.zh: 曾经在场的每一位

translation.en: ...waiting outside the bedroom door for me to kiss Todd...
translation.zh: 在卧室外面等着我吻陶德

translation.en: ...listening to me pretend to have sex with Brandon...
translation.zh: 听我假装跟布兰登上床

translation.en: ...paying me to lie for you...
translation.zh: 付我钱帮你们撒谎

translation.en: ...and calling me every name in the book.
translation.zh: 尽你们所能辱骂我

translation.en: You know, it was just like Hester in The Scarlet Letter.
translation.zh:
你们知道吗，我真的就像
《Scarlet Letter》里的海丝特

translation.en: Except that's the one thing the movies don't tell you:
translation.zh: 但电影没有告诉你们的是

translation.en: How shitty it feels to be an outcast. Warranted or not.
translation.zh:
被排挤的感受
不管理由是否正当

translation.en: How did you know I love this song?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我喜欢这首歌？

translation.en: I guessed.
translation.zh: 猜的

translation.en: I see you've been watching my live webcast. It's still going on, you know.
translation.zh:
看来你有在看我的网络直播
现在还在播

translation.en: Screw them. They've had enough of you. Figuratively speaking.
translation.zh:
去他们的，他们受够你
我只是比喻而已

translation.en: I borrowed my neighbor's mower. I came right over.
translation.zh:
我向邻居借了除草机
就这样直接过来

translation.en: That almost rhymed.
translation.zh: 差点就押韵了

translation.en: I know. I spent a minute on it.
translation.zh:
我知道，我花了一分钟
才想出来的

translation.en: I'll be right down.
translation.zh: 我马上下来

translation.en: That's Todd.
translation.zh: 那位是陶德

translation.en: Not that I owe you guys any more confessions, but I really like this guy...
translation.zh:
我不欠你们什么解释
但我真的很喜欢他

translation.en: ...and I might even lose my virginity to him.
translation.zh: 也许我会给他我的处女之身

translation.en: I don't know when it'll happen.
translation.zh: 我不知道什么时候会发生

translation.en: You know, it might be five minutes from now or tonight...
translation.zh:
也许从现在开始后五分钟
或者是今晚

translation.en: ...or six months from now or maybe on our wedding night.
translation.zh:
或是六个月后
也许是我们的新婚之夜

translation.en: But the really amazing thing is, it is nobody's goddamn business.
translation.zh: 但好在跟你们一点关系也没有

translation.en: Come on, where's she going?
translation.zh: 不会吧，她去哪？

translation.en: I thought she was going to take her clothes off.
translation.zh: 我以为她会脱衣服

translation.en: Demi Moore took her clothes off. This is bullshit.
translation.zh: 黛米摩尔就有脱，太扯了

translation.en: Come on. Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 不会吧，开什么玩笑

translation.en: -Piss off. -Come here, you punk.
translation.zh:
-去死
-废物，你给我过来

translation.en: Jack?
translation.zh: 杰克？

translation.en: That's a mighty snug little shelter, Huck.
translation.zh: 真是一个舒适的小窝，哈克

translation.en: I judge it's all right.
translation.zh: 我想还算可以

translation.en: Here, Jim, I'll take my turn at steering now.
translation.zh: 来吧，吉姆，现在轮到我掌舵了

translation.en: No, that's all right, Huck. I like steering.
translation.zh: 不，没关系，哈克，我喜欢掌舵

translation.en: Blue Devils!
translation.zh: 蓝色恶魔！
